Here are the list of valid commands: PLACE MOVE LEFT RIGHT REPORT ROBOT
For usage please refer to Readme.md file.
Enter any other text to exit.
Enter command: PLACE 0,0,NORTH
Enter command: MOVE
Enter command: REPORT
There is only one robot on the table.
Robot 1 is currently active
Robot 1 position : 0, 1 and direction : NORTH
Enter command: PLACE 0,0,NORTH
Enter command: LEFT
Enter command: REPORT
There are 2 robots on the table
Robot 1 is currently active
Robot 1 position : 0, 1 and direction : WEST
Enter command: ROBOT  2
Enter command: LEFT
Enter command: REPORT
There are 2 robots on the table
Robot 2 is currently active
Robot 2 position : 0, 0 and direction : WEST
Enter command: PLACE 1,2,EAST
Enter command: ROBOT 3
Enter command: MOVE
Enter command: MOVE
Enter command: LEFT
Enter command: MOVE
Enter command: REPORT
There are 3 robots on the table
Robot 3 is currently active
Robot 3 position : 3, 3 and direction : NORTH
Enter command: exit
Command entered is not in the list of valid commands.
Exiting the program.
